### R options ###

        xtable.include.rownames = FALSE, xtable.NA.string = "NA",

  chace      = FALSE,
  comment    = "",
  echo       = FALSE,
  warning    = FALSE,
  message    = FALSE,
  tidy       = TRUE,
  size       = 'large',
  fig.path   = "images/",
  fig.width  = 8, 
  fig.height = 8,
  fig.retina = 1,
  dpi        = 150)
